testcase.name: Free CRM Create a New Contact scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login page.........................................passed When title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters "ananda" and "123456"......................................passed Then user clicks the login button...........................................passed Then the user is on home page...............................................passed Then user clicks New contact link...........................................passed Then user enters contacts details "cucuber10" and "bdd10" and "manager".....passed Then user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
